name: Sands of Calamity
description:
Awakened in a strange land, it is up to the Hero, Astaroth, to defeat the evil being that has been plaguing the citizens of the Desert Continent for generations.

~Developer's Note~

Hey everybody! This is the first official release of my single man team, Re:Tri Studios! This is the fruits of a year's worth of labor learning a game engine and development skills. The game itself is very short, and can be completed in 30-45 minutes if you rush through it. If you explore and grind levels, probably 90 minutes tops. The game itself is free, but if you enjoyed it, consider donating so I can further hone my skills and produce even better content in the future!
